title: Supervised Learning with Scikit-Learn
description: In supervised learning, we want to learn the relationship between two datasets: the observed data X and an external variable y that we want to predict.

meta.title: Supervised Learning Concepts | Machine Learning Tutorial
meta.description: Explore supervised learning concepts like classification and regression using Python's scikit-learn library. Learn about nearest neighbor classification, linear regression, and support vector machines.
meta.keywords: supervised learning, classification, regression, nearest neighbor, linear regression, support vector machines, scikit-learn, Python

i18n.title: 使用Scikit - Learn进行监督学习
i18n.description: 在监督学习中，我们希望了解两个数据集之间的关系：观测数据X和我们想要预测的外部变量y。

meta.title: 监督学习概念 | 机器学习教程
meta.description: 使用Python的scikit - learn库探索分类和回归等监督学习概念。了解最近邻分类、线性回归和支持向量机。
meta.keywords: 监督学习, 分类, 回归, 最近邻, 线性回归, 支持向量机, scikit - learn, Python
